mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT ( RESIDX, RESNAME, RESRUN, RESNUM, TYPEIDX, RESCLEANSCORE, ADDRGU, ADDRDONG, OLDADDR, NEWADDR, NUMADDR, XPOS, YPOS ) VALUES ( #{RESIDX}, #{RESNAME}, #{RESRUN}, #{RESNUM}, #{TYPEIDX}, #{RESCLEANSCORE}, #{ADDRGU}, #{ADDRDONG}, #{OLDADDR}, #{NEWADDR}, #{NUMADDR}, #{XPOS}, #{YPOS} )
